scripts.//: This will start the application in production mode.
Full build of the client-side code with minification for running in production.
scripts.build:client: coffee -cb -o ./.client client/*.coffee && browserify ./.client -o main.js && uglifyjs main.js -mc --screw-ie8 -o main.min.js
scripts.//: Watch for client code changes to recompile them. No minification.
Reset server after code changes are done. Ignores changes done to tests, and client-side resources.
scripts.dev: npm run watch:client & npm run watch:node
